FuncDef: This command specifies the BFD parameters for the associated IP interface. If no parameters are defined the default value are used.
CLIs: bfd <transmit-interval> [ receive <receive-interval> ] [ multiplier <multiplier> ] [ echo-receive <echo-interval> ] [ type cpm-np ]

ParaDef.Info: Sets the transmit interval for the BFD session. Values-100 to 100000. ParamDefault: Default- 100
Sets the receive interval for the BFD session. Values-100 to 100000. ParamDefault: Default- 100
Sets the multiplier for the BFD session. Values-3 to 20. ParamDefault: Default- 3
Sets the minimum echo receive interval, in milliseconds, for the BFD session. Values-100 to 100000. ParamDefault: Default- 100
For the 7750 SR only, specifies that BFD sessions associated with this interface is created on the CPM network processor to allow for fast timers down to 10 ms granularity.
